Quotes: Expectation is the root of all heartache…
Author: William Shakespeare

Quotes: To keep the body in good health is a duty.. Otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear…
Author: Gautama The Lord Buddha

Quotes: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive…
Author: Elbert Hubbard

Quotes: You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and only way, it doesn't exist…
Author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Quotes: We can complain because rose bushes have thorns, or rejoice because thorn bushes have roses…
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quotes: To be good, and do good, is the whole duty of man comprised in a few words…
Author: Abigail Adams

Quotes: Life is a balance of holding on and letting go…
Author: Rumi

Quotes: A person often meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it…
Author: Jean de La Fontaine

Quotes: For success, attitude is equally important as ability…
Author: Walter Scott

Quotes: The secret of getting ahead is getting started…
Author: Mark Twain

Quotes: To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing…
Author: Elbert Hubbard

Quotes: If you suffer, thank God! It is a sure sign that you are alive…
Author: Elbert Hubbard

Quotes: In all things of nature, there is something of the marvelous…
Author: Aristotle

Quotes: The noblest pleasure is the joy of understanding…
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quotes: Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe…
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quotes: You must be wise, but not too wise…
Author: Alexander T. Stewart

Quotes: He who has conquered doubt and fear has conquered failure…
Author: James Lane Allen

Quotes: He who cannot give anything away cannot feel anything either…
Author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Quotes: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it…
Author: Lou Holtz

Quotes: The object of the superior man is truth…
Author: Confucius

Quotes: As the purse is emptied, the heart is filled…
Author: Victor Hugo

Quotes: Friendship is a single soul dwelling in two bodies…
Author: Aristotle

Quotes: He who fears being conquered is sure of defeat…
Author: Napoleon Bonaparte

Quotes: Love inspires, illuminates, designates and leads the way…
Author: Mary Baker Eddy

Quotes: Avoid popularity if you would have peace…
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quotes: All great ideas are dangerous…
Author: Oscar Wilde

Quotes: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without…
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quotes: Never trouble another for what you can do yourself…
Author: Thomas Jefferson

Quotes: Common looking people are the best in the world, that is the reason the Lord makes so many of them…
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quotes: Happiness never decreases by being shared…
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quotes: Life is as tedious as a twice-told tale…
Author: William Shakespeare

Quotes: What is my life if I am no longer useful to others…
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quotes: Throw off your worries when you throw off your clothes at night…
Author: Napoleon Bonaparte

Quotes: Perfection? Being the most human you can be…
Author: Giovanni Morassutti

Quotes: As I grow older, I pay less attention to what men say. I just watch what they do…
Author: Andrew Carnegie

Quotes: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal;nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude…
Author: Thomas Jefferson

Quotes: There is always a risk in being alive, and if you are more alive, there is more risk…
Author: Henrik Ibsen

Quotes: The future is the worst thing about the present…
Author: Gustave Flaubert

Quotes: Sometimes the people with the worst past, create the best future…
Author: Umar ibn Al-Khattab

Quotes: Always stand on principle, even if you stand alone…
Author: John Adams

Quotes: Try and fail, but don't fail to try…
Author: John Quincy Adams

Quotes: Positive anything is better than negative nothing…
Author: Elbert Hubbard

Quotes: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader…
Author: John Quincy Adams

Quotes: We are shaped by our thoughts, we become what we think…
Author: Gautama The Lord Buddha

Quotes: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant…
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson

Quotes: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without loosing heart…
Author: Robert Green Ingersoll

Quotes: Happiness is the only good. The time to be happy is now. The place to be happy is here. The way to be happy is to make others so…
Author: Robert Ingersoll

Quotes: I can calculate the motion of heavenly bodies, but not the madness of people…
Author: Isaac Newton

Quotes: The value of an idea lies in the using of it…
Author: Thomas A. Edison

Quotes: I never expect to see a perfect work from an imperfect man…
Author: Alexander Hamilton

Quotes: The most useless are those who never change through the years…
Author: James M. Barrie

Quotes: Life is something that everyone should try at least once…
Author: Henry J. Tillman

Quotes: If you wish to win a man over to your ideas, first make him your friend…
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quotes: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet…
Author: Aristotle

Quotes: I destroy my enemies when I make them my friends…
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quotes: For a man to conquer himself is the first and noblest of all victories…
Author: Plato

Quotes: Be yourself;everyone else is already taken…
Author: Oscar Wilde

Quotes: Whatever you are, be a good one…
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quotes: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness…
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quotes: I am not afraid;I was born to do this…
Author: Joan of Arc

Quotes: Without music, life would be a mistake…
Author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Quotes: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship…
Author: St. Thomas Aquinas

Quotes: The beginning is the most important part of the work…
Author: Plato

Quotes: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled…
Author: Plutarch

Quotes: Life is a festival only to the wise…
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quotes: The best way to predict your future is to create it…
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quotes: The miserable have no other medicine but only hope…
Author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Quotes: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action…
Author: Herbert Spencer

Quotes: Beware of missing chances, otherwise it may be altogether too late some day…
Author: Franz Liszt

Quotes: True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence of the future…
Author: Seneca

Quotes: One of the first signs of a spirit-filled life is enthusiasm…
Author: A. B. Simpson

Quotes: The things that we love tell us what we are…
Author: St. Thomas Aquinas

Quotes: Our greatest enemies, the ones we must fight most often, are within…
Author: Thomas Paine

Quotes: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth…
Author: Gautama The Lord Buddha

Quotes: When words fail music speaks…
Author: William Shakespeare

Quotes: Wise men speak because they have something to say;fools because they have to say something…
Author: Plato

Quotes: Knowing is not enough;we must apply. Willing is not enough;we must do…
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quotes: Experience is the teacher of all things…
Author: Julius Caesar

Quotes: Life is the continuous adjustment of internal relations to external relations…
Author: Herbert Spencer

Quotes: Hell is empty and all the devils are here…
Author: William Shakespeare

Quotes: To love another person is to see the face of God…
Author: Victor Hugo

Quotes: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony…
Author: Mahatma Gandhi

Quotes: Compromise makes a good umbrella but a poor roof…
Author: James Russell Lowell

Quotes: Life is a tale told by an idiot - full of sound and fury, signifying nothing…
Author: William Shakespeare

Quotes: There is no remedy for love but to love more…
Author: Henry David Thoreau

Quotes: Well done is better than well said…
Author: Benjamin Franklin

Quotes: The well bred contradict other people. The wise contradict themselves…
Author: Oscar Wilde

Quotes: You yourself as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection…
Author: Gautama The Lord Buddha

Quotes: He is able who think he is able…
Author: Gautama The Lord Buddha

Quotes: He who opens a school door, closes a prison…
Author: Victor Hugo

Quotes: It is better to be alone than in bad company…
Author: George Washington

Quotes: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body…
Author: Joseph Addison

Quotes: A superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions…
Author: Confucius

Quotes: It is a man's own mind, not his enemy or foe, that lures him to evil ways…
Author: Gautama The Lord Buddha

Quotes: The less one has to do, the less time one finds to do it in…
Author: Lord Chesterfield

Quotes: Do not do to others what angers you if done to you by others…
Author: Socrates

Quotes: Life is the flower for which love is the honey…
Author: Victor Hugo

Quotes: Man is the cruelest animal…
Author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Quotes: The creation of a thousand forests is in one acorn…
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quotes: As long as you live, keep learning how to live…
Author: Seneca
